## siblings() function

Get the siblings of an element, optionally filtered by selector(s).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function siblings<T extends Element>(element: Element, selectors?: string): T[];
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

element


</td><td>

Element


</td><td>

The element whose siblings will be returned.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

selectors


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ One or more selectors to match.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T\[\]
